title: A novel radical-reaction interruption strategy for enhancing the light stability of perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00902A, Paper
Binyang Tuo, Ziyu Wang, Ziqiu Ren, Hanwen Zhang, Xinqi Lu, Yiqiang Zhang, Shuangquan Zang, Yanlin Song
A novel approach has been proposed in this study to enhance the light stability of perovskite solar cells by effectively suppressing photoinduced radical reactions in perovskite films using TEMPO as a radical scavenger.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
